Title: Handmade Tibetan Singing Bowl (18th century)
Body (HTML):
Singing bowls produce beautiful music which invokes deep meditative and peaceful states. Singing bowls are often used in yoga, reiki, music therapy, and sound healing. The rich harmonies produced by signing bowls help balance the body’s chakras, eliminate stress, and promote holistic healing.                                                                  

 

Our handmade singing bowls are unparalleled in beauty and quality. Each bowl is carefully hand-crafted by skilled Tibetan artisans using traditional techniques. In accordance with an ancient Tibetan formula, our singing bowls are made of “panchaloga”, which is a Sanskrit word meaning a five-metal alloy that includes copper, zinc, iron, and traces of gold and silver. Our bowls create an incredible sound with rich, warm and vibrant overtones. Each bowl also comes with a gorgeous hand-carved wooden mallet*. The result is a beautiful piece of functional art with incredible healing properties.

Bonus Starter Kit: (Free)

1. Wooden Stick

2. Bottom Cushion

Here is a Sound Sample of our bowl:

 

Each of our singing bowls has been determined to be of master quality, which means that they have been rigorously tested to ensure that they meet our highest quality control standards. As a result, each of our singing bowls is among the finest in the world for aesthetic quality, richness of sound, sustainment of tone, and ease and smoothness of playing. Our singing bowls are of exceptional quality and will last a lifetime. While singing bowls of this quality typically retail for hundreds of dollars, we’ve decided to make them available at a much more affordable price in order to share their amazing healing properties.                                                                              

   

Our singing bowls each weigh approximately from 0.4 - 4.2 pounds. They are available from 3.2 inches - 10.3 inches in diameter . The rim’s thickness averages 1/8th of an inch. The wooden mallet weighs approximately 0.15 pounds and is 7.25 inches in length and 1 inch in width.

Title: Fencer™ - Wireless Electric Dog Fence
Body (HTML):
Let your pet have the freedom of your yard without the fear of them running

Your yard might be small. But that doesn’t mean you have to keep your pet on a short leash. Fencer's exclusive Wireless Plus technology lets your dog or cat play right up to the edge of your property. It has an adjustable operating distance of 500m, that's 60% more distance than most wireless dog fences, making it the perfect fit for tight spaces or uniquely shaped lots. So, relax. And let your pet make the most of your (not-so-square) yardage.



Features:

Completely Wireless: Fencer is 100% wireless saving you a lot of time during setup, theirs no wiring, and no burying. 

Adjustable Long Range & Short Range Distance: Fenser's long-range distance gives your pet more room to run and play. With a total control range of 1650ft/500meters in radius, you can control up to 150meters, of the total 500meter radius. Allowing you to give you're the pet the freedom and security they need, and the convenience of setting up your wireless dog fence anywhere.

1 Transmitter Support Multiple Collars: 1 transmitter supports 5 collars, if you have a large dog family, don't worry we've got you covered!                                                      

  

Stationary & Portable: Fencer has two power supplies, you can leave it stationary, plugged into the wall, or if you'd like to use it portably for traveling, you can unplug it and bring it with you. The wireless dog fence perimeter will remain up and active even when used portably because of the backup power supply inside of the transmitter. The transmitter lasts up to 10 hours before needing to be charged again, while being charged the wireless dog fence perimeter will remain active, to charge the transmitter, simply plug it back into the wall, leaving it in stationary mode.

Power Saving Mode: To conserve power, the receiver will go into standby mode if there are no operations within 1 minute. This will not affect the wireless fence operation, the fence and collar will remain on and active.

10Hr Backup Power Supply: Fencer features a built-in 1000mah backup battery that lasts up to 10 hours. If you're not at home and your power goes out, your pet will remain at home safely and securely.

Ultra Durable & Waterproof: We know how destructive pets can be, Fencer is ultradurable, waterproof, and rechargeable.

Trains and Stops Your Dog From Running Away: If your dog exceeds the range you've established, the receiver will initiate its training function automatically, which will remind the dog to return your designated safe area. The Fencer collar will beep 3 times, warning your pet to return to their area. If they do not return, the collar will begin to vibrate, for 3 to 4 seconds and then punishes with correction shocks. If your dog continues to leave, the process will repeat until your dog returns home. Afterward, the dog will not move forward when the collar begins to beep, or if they feel the vibration warning.

Plug and Play Setup: Plug-In the Receiver and Adjust the Size of the Radius (In Feet), Put the Collar On Your Pet and It's Ready to Go! It's Always Recommended You Train Your Dog To Learn their Boundary.

Three Training Modes: Three are three different training modes, beep, vibration, and a safe training shock. If your dog exceeds the range you've established, the receiver will initiate its training function automatically, which will remind the dog to return your designated safe area. More on how this works below.

How it Works:

  • The receiver has a control range of 500 meters in radius. You can control up to 150meters, of the total 500meter radius using the Plus(+) and Minus(-) button on the receiver.
  • Using the Plus(+) and Minus(-) button on the receiver you can adjust the signal level of the receiver from ranges 1 - 100. This adjusts the distance of the receiver's control radius from 1 -150m. 1m is signal level 1, 150m is signal level 100. The range will be displayed on the screen of the receiver.
  • Simply attach the receiver to your dog, to receive a constant wireless radio signal from the transmitter set up in your house, if your dog goes beyond the adjustable range, your dog will hear the collar beep 3 times, warning them to return back to their area, if they do not return, the collar we will begin to vibrate, for 3 to 4 seconds and then punishes with a safe correction shock. If your dog continues to leave, the process will repeat until your dog returns home. Afterward, the dog will not move forward when the collar begins to beep, or if they feel the vibration warning.
  • For optimal performance, please fix the transmitter 5ft from the ground, and away from metal walls to avoid any signal interference.
  • The receiver will go into stand by mode to save power if theirs no operations within 1 minute.

Please Note: Setting markers for your pet, to help them understand where their boundaries are, will help train your dog to remember where their area ends.

 

- Will not work with Metal Buildings or Masonry Walls

 

- For large estates only: 50 feet house to boundary minimum requirement

 

Why Fencer is better than competitors:

      Fun Instrument You Can Instantly Play & Sound Good in 5 Minutes

      You will be pleasantly surprised at how easy it is to play - within minutes, you can learn to play a tune.

      You will love the feeling of success when you impress your friends & family by playing this incredible instrument!

      A Great Hobby and Relaxing Distraction

      Great for someone looking to try something new. You will absolutely mesmerized by the resonating tones and you will be instantly addicted to it as well.

      If you have a dog or cat, they will always come out to lay in your lap as your play.  The sound will put your dogs and cats in a peaceful mood, they will take naps as you play. (true story) 

      All your friends and your whole family will enjoy the plunky sound it produces too!

      The Secret Why Anyone Can Play Kalimba in 5 Minutes

      1. Fool-proof Numbered Musical Notations

      Kalimba Finger Piano uses a system of numbered musical notations, meaning anyone can learn to play in minutes—even with zero prior musical education or experience.

      Even better, this numbers-based approach makes even advanced songs accessible, so you can start playing what you love right away.

      And the way the numbers work is simple.

      Here’s an example: The Numbers "1" to "7" on the Kalimba Instrument represent the musical notes of C, D, E, F, G, A, B or "do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, si, ti.” 

      Now the first part of the popular tune "Old MacDonald Had A Farm" now becomes: 1 1 1 1, 6 6 6, 3 3 2 2 1 - "Old Mac-don-ald had a farm, E, I, E, I O.”

      Just follow the numbers, and you have a tune. Easy! 

      2. Beginner-Friendly Starter-Kit

      This Kalimba comes with an instruction book that gives clear instructions on the different parts of Kalimba Instrument, how to hold it correctly, how to play it and how to tune etc.

      After spending a few minutes going through the instruction manual, you will find that it is quite easy to learn how to play, in one day you will be able to play a complete song with ease.

      FAQ :

      What do I do with the colored stickers?

      The stickers can be used to help identify the keys, so you know which one is C, A, D, etc. Will help in learning where each key is while learning to play the instrument. 

      What key is this?

      Pre-tuned in C.

Do you suffer from nasal congestion and thick snot that makes it hard to breathe?

This sinus rinse helps to gently removes dirt, pollen, mold, dust, mucus and other pollutants and allows you to breathe normally again.

Features:

  • This product is suitable for routing nasal irrigation ,or daily nasal care for individuals who inhale large amount of dust due to occupational reasons.

    Precaution:

    1. DO NOT RINSE if nasal passage is completely blocked or if you have an ear infection or blocked ears.
    2. Never put in boiling water to damage the bottle. Not higher than 60℃.
    3. If you have had ear surgery, please contact your physician prior to irrigation.
    4. Do not rinse if your nasal passage is completely blocked.
    5. We recommend that parents use this product only on children who are above 12.
    6. If your child is less than twelve years old, you should consult your child's physician before using this product.

    How to use:

    Step 1: Wash your hands. Fill the clean bottle up to the fill line (500ml) with lukewarm distilled water or previously boiled water.

    Step 2: Cut the Nasal Wash Salt pour its contents into the bottle. Tighten the cap & tube on the bottle securely. Place one finger over the tip of the cap and shake the bottle gently to dissolve the mixture.

    Step 3: Standing in front of a sink, bend forward to your comfort level and tilt your head down. Keeping your mouth open and without holding your breath, place cap snugly against your right nostril and squeeze Bottle Gently until the solution starts draining from the opposite nostril or from your mouth.

    Step 4: Blow your nose gently, without pinching your nose completely because this will apply pressure on the eardrums.

    Step 5: Now repeat steps 3 & 4 for your left nostril.

This Indoor / Outdoor Projection Screen offers a widescreen of viewing pleasure right on your own lawn. Set up and take down is simple and easy, taking only a few minutes!

The Avolve's luxurious 30 - 133 inch 4K screen can turn any room into a movie theatre. Thanks to the grey 1.3 gain ambient light rejecting material, this screen can play 4K material in any environment. It has 2D and 3D capability.                                    

 

See Screen Dimensions Here

Grey Colored 1.3 Gain Material:

The Avolve's Frameless Projector is the only thing that offers the 1.3 material. The soft, grey, 1.3 gain material provides all the 1.0 material features and more. On top of being textureless, free of graininess/sparkles, and a near perfect lambertian diffuser, the material is also ambient light rejecting and specifically deigned for 4K. This ensures that all colours are accurately reproduced, providing more vibrant and life-like HD projection - which allows up to 950% higher contrast. The ambient light rejecting material allows for projection even in light environments – allowing this screen to be the center piece in a living room.                                                                                       

  

Perfect Picture Geometry:

The lack of texture is also responsible for the perfect pixel geometry. 1080P projectors are now the standard, which means that they must be paired with a material that will not degrade its pixel geometry. While many screens are textured and grainy, degrading the effective resolution to much less than 1080P, this Studio Reference 4K screen has zero texturing, ensuring absolute preservation of sharpness, resolution and detail clarity. Any Reference Studio 4K material will perfectly resolve 4K resolution in both today’s high end and future 4K projectors, saving you a screen upgrade.

Iron The Screen When Needed:

If you notice any wrinkles in your screen it can be Ironed and stretched to negate it. This feature alone makes it long lasting.                                                                                      

  

Performance:

We recommend pairing the 4K screen with a 4K projector to ensure that the screen reaches its optimum performance. We also recommend the use of the screen with any projector to maximize the projectors performance. The screen displays its superior performance in environments where ambient light is controlled. The screen is also designed for 2D and 3D action, tested to bring minimum crosstalk and maximum 3D immersion. The ability to minimize 3D crosstalk helps to decrease viewer fatigue for active 3D projection.

Installation:

The screen installation is made easy by the Velcro that is provided with the package.

Title: Kalimba Hand Piano
Body (HTML):
The kalimba is an African musical instrument consisting of a wooden board (often collated with a resonator) with attached staggered metal tines, played by holding the instrument in the hands and plucking the tines with the thumbs. Just need to use two thumbs to make a sound. The Kalimba Instrument is produced and classified as part of the lamellaphone family, and part of the idiophone/Mbira family of musical instruments.

      Fun Instrument You Can Instantly Play & Sound Good in 5 Minutes

      You will be pleasantly surprised at how easy it is to play - within minutes, you can learn to play a tune.

      You will love the feeling of success when you impress your friends & family by playing this incredible instrument!

      A Great Hobby and Relaxing Distraction

      Great for someone looking to try something new. You will absolutely mesmerized by the resonating tones and you will be instantly addicted to it as well.

      If you have a dog or cat, they will always come out to lay in your lap as your play.  The sound will put your dogs and cats in a peaceful mood, they will take naps as you play. (true story) 

      All your friends and your whole family will enjoy the plunky sound it produces too!

      The Secret Why Anyone Can Play Kalimba in 5 Minutes

      1. Fool-proof Numbered Musical Notations

      Kalimba Finger Piano uses a system of numbered musical notations, meaning anyone can learn to play in minutes—even with zero prior musical education or experience.

      Even better, this numbers-based approach makes even advanced songs accessible, so you can start playing what you love right away.

      And the way the numbers work is simple.

      Here’s an example: The Numbers "1" to "7" on the Kalimba Instrument represent the musical notes of C, D, E, F, G, A, B or "do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, si, ti.” 

      Now the first part of the popular tune "Old MacDonald Had A Farm" now becomes: 1 1 1 1, 6 6 6, 3 3 2 2 1 - "Old Mac-don-ald had a farm, E, I, E, I O.”

      Just follow the numbers, and you have a tune. Easy! 

       

      2. Beginner-Friendly Starter-Kit

      This Kalimba comes with an instruction book that gives clear instructions on the different parts of Kalimba Instrument, how to hold it correctly, how to play it and how to tune etc.

      After spending a few minutes going through the instruction manual, you will find that it is quite easy to learn how to play, in one day you will be able to play a complete song with ease.

      FAQ :

      What do I do with the colored stickers?

      The stickers can be used to help identify the keys, so you know which one is C, A, D, etc. Will help in learning where each key is while learning to play the instrument. 

      What key is this?

      Pre-tuned in C.
